name: R.O.B.O.T.
description:
Unique technology transfers on your screen what you are experiencing at next gen consoles.

The R.O.B.O.T. is the ultimate space 3rd person shooter, that takes you into the near future, where mankind dominated intergalactic travel. The year is 2112 at Omega station on the planet called Mars 2. On this planet, mankind experiments with new artificial intelligence for robots Centurion-Citizen series 2. The Earth already has no response with this base for a few weeks, so they sent you, Ultimate Intergalactic Seal(UIS), to find out what is happening. Your primary task is to make contact with the Omega base, and remove any possible threats at any cost.

The game is built on a new engine that combines unique effects with maximum performance using mobile devices.

Works on iPhone 3GS, iPhone 4, iPhone 4S, iPod Touch 3rd generation, iPod Touch 4rd generation, iPad, iPad2 and iPad3 and newer.
